sourcesContent: import React from 'react' import ReactDOM from 'react-dom' import { Parallax, ParallaxLayer } from 'react-spring/addons/parallax' const url = (name, wrap = false) => `${wrap ? 'url(' : ''}https://awv3node-homepage.surge.sh/build/assets/${name}.svg${wrap ? ')' : ''}` class Groupe extends React.Component { render() { return ( (this.parallax = ref)} pages={3}> this.parallax.scrollTo(1)} style={{ display: 'flex', alignItems: 'center', justifyContent: 'center' }}> this.parallax.scrollTo(2)} style={{ display: 'flex', alignItems: 'center', justifyContent: 'center' }}> this.parallax.scrollTo(0)}> ) } } export default Groupe
